ai-patthana15.70:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.70:0.3_0: Standing on the bank of the skillful, the workshop and the earth.
ai-patthana15.70:1.1_0: Don’t give rise to diversity of skillful qualities. Nor do they arise because of convicentrate on the skillful.
ai-patthana15.70:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.70:2.1_0: Mindful is not skilled in the teaching for refuge.
ai-patthana15.70:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.70:3.1_0: Nor has not been declared by someone else.
ai-patthana15.70:3.1_1: Nor has not been declared by someone else.
ai-patthana15.70:3.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
ai-patthana15.70:5.1_0: Nor has been declared by the teaching or the text on monastic training.
ai-patthana15.70:5.1_1: No matter what the undeclared questions, the Teaching, or the Monastic Law,
ai-patthana15.70:6.1_0: for two reasons, when the support is finished, they experience the ending of the defilements.
